headline: December 2025 Monthly Release
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today announced estimated catastrophe losses for the month of December of $80 million or $64 million, after-tax. Total catastrophe losses for the fourth quarter were $209 million or $165 million, after-tax.

headline: Is Allstate’s RAPID X Push Quietly Redefining Its Data Edge And Moat In Insurance (ALL)?
summary: The Institutes RiskStream Collaborative® recently named Allstate, Liberty Mutual, and The Hartford as 2025 Leadership Award winners for advancing RAPID X, an auto claims data-exchange solution aimed at improving claims handling and addressing issues such as legal system abuse and early injury identification. This recognition underscores how Allstate’s work on digital claims data-sharing is increasingly viewed as central to solving complex industry pain points rather than just streamlining...
